Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: ..//Home of the Real Estate blockchain.  We are convinced that our new blockchain application will make the real estate market more transparent and cheaper. Not only the purchase and financing, but also the development and management of these real estate properties.    Mortgage and old-fashioned banks At present, when it comes to real estate financing, we are still largely depending on old-fashioned banks that charge high fees and have a vague acceptance policy.  Our new crypto currency, MarbCoin, together with our application, should help to reduce the costs of this form of financing. Smart contracts should increase acceptance for a loan because of a faster understanding of financial possibilities.  Lack of transparency Often, investments in real estate are not always fully transparent. What exactly is being invested in? Who exactly will become the owner? What are the exact costs of the complete investment and financing? Has the property already been rented out? And if so, to who is it rented and on what terms? With our application this information can be retrieved both beforehand and afterwards at the touch of a button.    Usage examples Below are some examples of how our blockchain and application can be used. The blockchain application is still under development and in the future we will continue to work on the application to add more functions.  Financing of real estate If financing is required to acquire a home or commercial property, a smart contract can be created. All data of the object and the financing details are entered in the blockchain.   Purchase and sale of residential and commercial property With the application, a house can be offered for sale and others can immediately place a bid.  Property management and rentals Our application makes the property management and rentals much simpler and more transparent.  Investing in real estate Investing in real estate is becoming much more transparent due to the public nature of the blockchain.  Click here for more detailed examples.   Any question? Please let us know, we will try to response asap.    Website   Whitepaper | FAQ | Partner program

Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: reserved

Author: dzkrb
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: I think that before starting to implement its project, the team has already familiarized themselves with similar projects. They are on this forum dozens. What do you propose such that you should put your project first among the rest?

Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: We want to offer an application that is largely free of charge. Real estate agents ask for determining the value of your home and to list it.  With the MarbCoin app it is possible to save on agent fees and financing costs.  An application like ours only works if it is widely distributed, and through our extensive network of real estate professionals we truly think we can offer added value there.

Author: Krezz2017
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: And in which countries do you intend to develop your project? You correctly wrote that such projects should be known, supported by society, be better than other competitors.

Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: Thank you for you question. We will start with the markets we know best in the following order, Spain, Germany, The Netherlands, UK, Ireland, France, Portugal, Belgium, Sweden and slowly but steady the rest of the world ....  Of course we would like to launch an app like this for the entire world at one. But we want to comply with every local regulation.

Author: Krezz2017
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: So you write that your platform, your coin will help reduce the price of the real estate market. How do you imagine that? Any possession, any lease implies a contract indicating the amount in Fiat and requires registration. How can I register in your coin?

Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: Hi Krezz,  For now, the biggest saving is that of the real estate agents costs, depending on where you live this can be around 2 to 10% of the purchase price. Reducing those costs through a largely automated system is already a huge saving for buyers.

Author: bongbong2014
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: With MarbCoin application, users can easily list a residential or commercial property for sale. Once done, the property appears in the application and its associated websites to show that the particular property is up for sale.

Author: MarbCoin
Title: [ANN][ICO] MarbCoin Home of the real estate Blockchain
Body: Yes, we have a lot of experience in software (online & offline) for real estate agents. Properties for sale will be available in our app, and via an API on several websites.
